content.detailedDescription: Http://sierrafire.Cr.Usgs.Gov/camhist/viewer09.Pl?Camera=jordan_peak_1&visible=false&date=20110728&movie=0&frame=4
content.summary: Looking at webcam on 7/28/2011 jordan peak webcam #1

content.detailedDescription: This incident took place about 9:15 pm on saturday 7.30.2011. i was driving down interstate 65 near exit 71 concord lane going toward nashville. first we saw approximately 25 to 30 cars pulled over on the side of the interstate. they were in groups as if in a caravan that was stopped. it was at this time my wife saw the lights on my side of the car in the sky. we live in this area so we knew there should not be any lights there. we were planning on getting off exit 71 anyway to go home however this time i took the opposite way heading toward the lights that appeared to be over the brentwood baptist church . the sky was relatively cloud free in this area. as we got closer to the church the lights started to disappear. they then vanished completely from view and was replaced by an odd cloud formation. on the way to the church parking lot after getting off the interstate numerous other vehicles were stopped and people were going in and turning around in the parking lot. numerous people were stopped in the parking lot and outside of their vehicles.  we talked to at least 3 different people who said they also saw the lights. i saw about 4 or 5 lights and my wife said she saw about 8 or 9. she reported that the formation looked like an arrow. i saw more of a triangle shape. to make it clear i was driving so it was hard for me to focus to get a good steady view. the best view i got was sitting at the stop light waiting to turn into the church parking lot and that was more of it going away. my wife said that the arrow shape appeared more as we got closer and that her first view was in the tree line from the interstate. the lights were yellowish orange and looked uniform in size and color to me.
content.summary: Shaped lights in sky

content.detailedDescription:
In 1989 me and a friend were out hunting rabbits in local fields in mansfield,nottinghamshire,england about 8.30pm when we heard a noise of a large plane high in the sky, as we were looking for the plane we noticed a light comming towards us at high speed,it was nearly overhead when it did a 90 degree turn (like using a set square) without slowing down and dissapeared off into the distance,as we stood totally shocked by this about 5 seconds later 2 dark helicopters follwed the same path banked and too went off into the distance after the light.
the original soung of a high flying plane(we believe it was a a.W.A.X. early warning aircraft) was there all the time but now we could see its lights very high in the sky and this follwed the same path and turned at the same point following.
nothing has ever happened to us like this before we have seen police helicopters over us  and know how they behave at nite but nothing like this.
content.summary: Moving light 90 degree turn followed by 2 helicopters and awax

content.detailedDescription: I just woke up in my apartament in belo horizonte and filmed the sky trying to capture the "rod" phenomenon, but when i watched the recording, i noticed a white sphere in the sky. i haven't saw anything with naked eye. there was nothing in the sky. no planes, baloons or helicopters
content.summary: I heard about the

content.detailedDescription: I was outside on my patio, at around 1 15 am, having a cigarrette, lookng up at the sky, all the stars, facing north. looking at the constellation draco and cepheus, i witnessed an orange light appear suddenly, orange white center, move at a moderate speed from a west to east direction. it lat abuot a good 8-9 seconds, then simply disappeard. their was no noise. usually, with airplanes, thiers 3 lights, and the engine aferburn..This orange ball had none of that. being an ex professional amateur astronomer, it appeared to be in our atmoshere.  i have seen plenty of metoers streak across the sy, sicne i was a kid to my 36 years of age now..And their always either green, blue or white.  i have never ever seen an airplane, with one solid light moving at a moderate speed that far north, from where i live..Ever. it simply disappeared into the darkness. had a very good view of the skyk, no tree obstruction.  so im here reporting it! it wasnt an earth-manmade satellite either..Seen many of those with my 4.5 inch reflector as a kid. saw the international space station appear as a ghost image moving south to north last year, much fast than this organge ball. so ide def rule out a manmade satellite.
content.summary: Semi bright orange ball simply disappeared, no noise

content.detailedDescription: I've recently seen several unexplainable objects in the sky when walking my dogs at night so i've been periodically checking out the sky. about an hour ago i watched as what appeared to be a twinkling star slowly descended over about 30 minutes time. the object got close enough for me to see it changing colors red, blue, white, yellow, & green.The lights appeared to reflect off of something above them but i couldn't see a definate structure.  at first i thought it was a star but i've never seen  star get this big or change colors like this. i originally seen the object to the west, then it started slowly moving north. the object is still out there right now! i've been seeing objects like this for about a month now in between 10 p.M. and 5 a.M. they don't show up every night but have been around 4-5 nights a week! it may be explainable but i've never seen any kind of aircraft move this slow and stay airborne as well as change colors like it is. conventional aircraft blink a red and green light but these aren't blinking, they change from one to the other without stopping or dimming. unfortunately the digital camera i own won't pick up the lights in the sky nor will my cellphone.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: *object changing colors comes down from sky then hovers and moves slowly.

content.detailedDescription: I've recently seen several unexplainable objects in the sky when walking my dogs at night so i've been periodically checking out the sky. about an hour ago i watched as what appeared to be a twinkling star slowly descended over about 30 minutes time. the object got close enough for me to see it changing colors red, blue, white, yellow, & green.The lights appeared to reflect off of something above them but i couldn't see a definate structure.  at first i thought it was a star but i've never seen  star get this big or change colors like this. i originally seen the object to the west, then it started slowly moving north. the object is still out there right now! i've been seeing objects like this for about a month now in between 10 p.M. and 5 a.M. they don't show up every night but have been around 4-5 nights a week! it may be explainable but i've never seen any kind of aircraft move this slow and stay airborne as well as change colors like it is. conventional aircraft blink a red and green light but these aren't blinking, they change from one to the other without stopping or dimming. unfortunately the digital camera i own won't pick up the lights in the sky nor will my cellphone.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: *object changing colors comes down from sky then hovers and moves slowly.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and three friends were getting into a vehicle. as we were getting in i looked up and this bright halogen light descended from a high altitude down to 2000ft to 3000 ft at a southerly steep angle and then shot from south to north at a high rate of speed way faster than any military jet i had seen.My one friend seen it drop like i did , my two other friends only caught a glimpse of it.  we were just like "wow that was kool" and then we didn't give it much thought after that and continued with our business.

the next day i call a girlfriend who lived 30 miles to the north. she said she was outside smoking a cigarette when the light shot over her house towards the north. i then told we had seen it too and that i actually saw it drop from the sky and change course.
content.summary: Bright light like a halogen

content.detailedDescription:
Appeared to be moving in a circle over the water, either there were at least 3 lights or it circled 3 times

i was in my backyard smoking a cig talking to my girlfriend on the phone
i noticed a bright amber light  brighter then the aircraft flying the sky
i did not know what the light was
i was almost in shock this is the third time i have seen this type of light

move out of my visual range
content.summary: Amber light:  attention lillian waters

content.detailedDescription:
I regret not having reported this at the time of the sighting. i basically filed it away as ((thee)) strangest thing i've ever seen in my life.  but my mind keeps harkening back to this evening so often i feel i must pursue an explanation.

i'm a highly-intelligent, educated, open-minded independent businesswoman 
who is also an amateur astronomer, having been president of the berks county amateur astronomical society for 3 years and a member of the lehigh valley group for many years.
at the time of the sighting, i was 59.

it was a friday evening in the early fall of 2007. (i regret not having 
noted the date at the time).
i pulled in to the parking lot of the riviera restaurant located on rt. 272 near reamstown, pa. (lancaster county)
getting out of the car, i noted to myself how amazingly clear and crisp the weather had become after a day of hazy and cloudy skies.

coming out of the restaurant around 9:30 pm, i sat down behind the wheel of my car and looked straight out of my windshield onto a single clumping of white, solid-looking cumulus-like clouds hovering at what seemed to be an unusually low altitude. my car was oriented facing the south east.

the entire formation was about the size of my fist 
held at arms' length. i can only guess it was between 5 and 10 miles in the distance.
it was 25 to 30 degrees above the horizon with an absolutely clear sky 
everywhere else.
lightning bolts were wrapping themselves around the cloud and through the 
cloud, with occasional bolts directed downward to the ground.
i was transfixed by this strange sight.  bolts of lightening almost every 
second, some of them illuminating the cloud from behind, and some directly visible as forked powerful bolts of lightning. it was like i was sitting at a drive-in movie.

i remember thinking to myself, "good lord, the people living underneath that cloud must be thinking it's the end of the world".
i observed this for over 20 minutes... hundreds of lightning bolts, sometimes two or three at a time. at least one every second or so. no sound.  where was the thunder?

at the time i had a pilot weather application for my cell phone which had a lightning 'mode' whereby one could see lightning strikes in a storm shown as individual yellow 'x's on the map of an area .  i enlarged the map area to include a hundred mile radius from my location. not one single lightning strike appeared in the entire area except for a huge ball of yellow directly over where i estimated the cloud to be located, se of reamstown.
so many lightning strikes that individual x's merged into a ball of yellow.

as there was no sign of this phenomenon letting up, and being tired after a full work-day, i headed home towards reading but kept an eye on the cloud in my rear-view mirrors for several miles until the road led me over a hill and i lost sight of it.

recently, i decided to google earth the location, and discovered that within 5 - 7 miles (correction, google map says 10 miles) in the line of sight from my car and the estimated location of 
the cloud, there exists a quarry (silver hill quarry, narvon, pa) as well as further on the highest point for many miles, a pinnacle about 600 in altitude (state game lands #52)  this area seems to be the 
least inhabited of this local part of the county.

was this a cloud-wrapped ufo "recharging" using the water and/or minerals in the quarry?
content.summary: Stationary cloud formation in an otherwise perfectly clear sky emitting hundreds of lightning bolts within cloud and cloud to ground

content.detailedDescription: I live in the casecade foot hills. i went outside to star gaze one clear night this last july 2011 and i noticed a huge translucent white sphere with white twisted shaped  wings at the base that might be propulsion or maybe just friction......This was very high up, i could not tell how high.........I have seen the space station fly over my home before, but this was bigger and faster and held a steady course.........My first impression of this object was " this is no jet or plane " i was transfixed.........I tried to reason through what i seeing for the minute plus it took to leave my sight.................It is hard to judge things high up in the sky, and i am not one to jump to conclusions, but this was clearly something like i have never seen before.......Size, speed and shape.............After it was out of view i got on the computer to find out where the space station was. it was on the other side of the world from my pacific n.W. home.........I have tried to find any similar sightings on web pages...........No luck so far........What ever i saw, it was wonderful to witness.
content.summary: Large sphere traveling very fast over head

content.detailedDescription:
I was out walking the dogs shortly before 9pm edt.  i observed a very bright "fireball" looking object on the northern horizon.  this object proceeded on a southerly course and flew directly over top of me.  altitude was approximately 2-3,000 feet.  the object had a very bright red light that appeared to be at the front portion of the rotating craft.  this first object, after passing over me, vanished.  

i then noticed a second object, exact same characteristics, once again appear on the northern horizon.  at this point i asked my wife and daughter to come out and look at the object.  my wife brought her dslr 14mp camera.  once again, the object was a rotating circular orb with an extremely bright red light.  it followed the exact same course/heading as the first craft (north to south ... straight line).  altitude was approximately 2-3,000 feet and speed was similar to that of a commercial jet flying at the altitude.  

this time, my wife was able to take two pictures of the object.  they are attached.  more importantly, i grabbed a 15 million candlepower spotlight and began to shine it directly on the object at its closest approach to us (nearly overhead).  after 4-5 bursts of the spotlight, the bright red light on the object immediately ceased.  i continued to shine the light on the object and was able to observe the following:

> the object appeared solid.
> the object had a round, circular shape.
> the object was clearly rotating or spinning.
> the object appeared to be 1/3 the size of a commercial airliner at that altitude.
> the object had a dull gray or dull silver color that reflected the spotlight beam.
> the object continued on a southerly course, with no visible light, until we could no longer see it.

i am an avid amateur astronomer with many years of experience.  i also am very well versed in meteorology.  i know what commercial and military aircraft look like, as we are in the flight path of commercial and military airports.  i also know that the atmosphere was clear and stable at the time of the sighting.  i know what most objects are in the sky... such as planets, stars, constellations, satellites etc.  i firmly believe that the object that was witnessed by my wife, daughter and me was not something that i have ever seen before.  it was certainly extraordinary.  i think i am most puzzled by the way the object immediately cut out its light when i focused a spotlight on it.  it certainly took my breath away to see the shape and color of the solid object.  

please feel free to contact me if you would like to discuss this further.
content.summary: Glowing object.  when illuminated with spotlight glowing ceased.  gray craft.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my porch around 9:45 pm, i was playing music in my complex, while others were playing cards. i notice what i thought was a large bright glowing object pulsating slowly coming like towards me and then with out no sound desecened slowly from my view. i was puzzle so i call a friend of mine nearby ( hank ),i holler at him to look up quickly but by the time he was able to the object had gone behind some trees to my far left. as we was walking back to my porch, to my far right this glowing pulsating object slowy began to rise above the trees there.Several other people saw the same thing at this time, then it got bright and slowly move like over the hudson river to my left and just speeded away from us at unbeliveable speed towards southeast. as it move away it got smaller very quickly, i just stood stun at what i just witness, it made no sound what so ever. i call my cousin who lived a couple of rows over and she and others saw the same thing. i've seen many types of aircrafts in the military, never seen anything like this.
content.summary: Thought it was an airplane going down around 9:45 pm very bright and glowing it went down around the hudson then a couple of minutes later it ascended up and slwy move then speend very fast.

content.detailedDescription: Me my fiance and my daughter were at west gates elementary school at the park at about 8:50pm. after being there for about ten minutes two younger children had pointed up in the sky and said what's that?. we had stopped what we were doing and watch this basketball shaped bright orange object move across the sky we knew exactly what it was. it seemed like it came out of no where and we watched it. as it moved from east to west it seemed like it was going fast then slowing down, going fast then slowing down again. when it was changing speed it seemed to have been leaving a trail. we watched it for about 3 min and then it just disapeared. this isnt the first time we had seen something at this location.
content.summary: Ufo sighting in new york

content.detailedDescription: Me my fiance and my daughter were at west gates elementary school at the park at about 8:50pm. after being there for about ten minutes two younger children had pointed up in the sky and said what's that?. we had stopped what we were doing and watch this basketball shaped bright orange object move across the sky we knew exactly what it was. it seemed like it came out of no where and we watched it. as it moved from east to west it seemed like it was going fast then slowing down, going fast then slowing down again. when it was changing speed it seemed to have been leaving a trail. we watched it for about 3 min and then it just disapeared. this isnt the first time we had seen something at this location.
content.summary: Ufo sighting in new york

content.detailedDescription: Two fire like red orange objects moving slowly in a straight line one approached close to the other and then move back.  they disappeared into the night.  they crossed the road i was traveling near my home in a residential neighborhood where i was babysitting for my daughter and her husband.  i then tried to follow them but trees blocked my view.  i went around the block and comming up the same road only a minute later near my house i saw them again in a repeat of the first sighting that was exactly the same.  this time there was a car parked on the road with a man and a  woman who witnessed the sight.  very strange.  also viewed by my son in law. a liutenent in a local police force here who lives three blocks from me.  that's it.  i called 911 and they said there were no other reports of a sighting up to that time i called. they said they would send a police car around.  no other info.  not yet anyway. possible photos from my son in law.
content.summary: Two fire like objects.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on the steps of my swimming pool around 10:00 pm on july 29, 2011 as i was swimming laps in my pool. i was looking over some trees in my neighbors yard toward the western sky. i saw a very bright white light that lasted about 3-5 seconds just above the trees. i would guess i was looking at about 45 degrees above the horizon. i can not say whether the light was on before it came into view over the trees. it only appeared to me that it was turned on and then turned off. at first i thought it was a helicopter that turned on a bright light. then, the light went out and it traveled away with a light that looked like a small star. it traveled from west to east in a straight line until it went behind some more trees and i could not see it anymore. it appeared to be very high like a commercial passenger plane but its lights did not blink.
content.summary: Avery bright white light appeares for about 3-5 seconds and then went off. then it traveled across the sky from west to east with only a small light that looked like a small star.

content.detailedDescription: Epasode 71 i carly when assened stairs to see her room fire;fly bye in windows.
content.summary: Ufo on tv

content.detailedDescription: In icarly episode 71 when her room was on fire it flew bye windows as thay assened the stairs.
content.summary: Fly bye

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dogs before bed around 2 am and noticed a bright whiteish orb to the east. it appeared to be over tulsa, but not certain. as i watched it appeared to be moving in a zig zag pattern. it was partly cloudy and you could see some stars in the sky but in this area they couldn't be seen due to the clouds. after about 3 minutes it started ascending slowly. you could see the light enter the clouds and they began to glow around the object as it passed up through the clouds. within a minute or so the object appeared to break through the clouds and you could see it slowly get smaller as it left but was still making the top of the clouds glow slightly. within minutes of seeing this two jet aircraft of some kind flew in from the west. they were flying really fast for any aircraft i've seen in the area. you couldn't hear their engines until they were almost out of sight.
content.summary: *white orb hovers with erratic movements before ascending.

content.detailedDescription:
I received a call from mufon international director on 7/25/11, 9:20 a.M.
to follow up on a ufo sighting report from a witness.  

first contact: called witness on 7/25/11.  left message on answering machine.

second contact: witness called 7/26/11, 7 pm, but investigator was not available at time of call.  investigator returned call to witness on 7/26/11 and scheduled a time to meet to pursue an investigation of sighting.  time and date of investigation was set for 7/30/11 at 10:30 a.M.

third contact:  investigation with witness was conducted.  witness' information (map and detailed description of his sighting) was gathered along with completion of mufon's general sighting case report form #1.
investigation took approx 40 minutes to complete witness.

during investigation, witness reported that he went to his front door on the evening of july 17, 2011, approx. 9:30 p.M.  he witnessed a very bright light slowly coming from the east towards his direction. witness stated the object's altitude was around 1,000-2,000 feet above the ground and came to about 300-400 feet towards him then turned slowly to the  southeast and continued until he lost sight of it behind from trees. 
witness stated the whole incident took approx 4-6 minutes.  witness called his wife who also observed object.  witness stated that as the bright light approached him, he could see a cylinder-shaped object with what seemed like transparent ribbed-shaped panels on the outside of the object with a flat bottom.  witness stated there was no sound coming from the craft, but as the craft approached it emitted what looked like "sparkles" 
coming from the craft.  after sighting, witness called mufon's international director to report the sighting.

after interviewing the witness, this investigator completed a sighting report on mufon's cms data base 7/30/11, 2:15 p.M.
content.summary: Witness observed bright white cylinder craft w/ribbs in sky coming from the east of his house then turn and slowly change direction to south east.

content.detailedDescription:
On october 9, 2010 at about 12 am, i was viewing the stars with binoculars in the direction of cassiopeia and andromeda; i was trying to find the galaxy (very hard in los angeles).  as i was searching for andromeda, the object came into view.  it was oval and it reflected the street light below. the color is unknown but it was light because it reflected the street light.  there was a black line on it's trailing edge which was broad, not narrow. there were no aviation marker lights. i tracked it for a few seconds.  it was traveling from northwest to southeast. i don't think that it was a novelty balloon because it would have bounced around. i don't think that it was a weather balloon, aren't they round?  i was thinking that it could be an errant advertising balloon. how likely would they get loose? besides, i didn't see any ropes hanging from it, since i was using binoculars.  

to the west is lax. planes flyover my house when the airport is fogged over, and on clear days from afar i can see the planes looping around to land.

to the east is el monte airport and ontario airport. from ontario, i can see planes leaving at night. 

to the north is the san gabriel mountains and the san gabriel valley. when i am on the sun deck which is the gargage, i can see the whole valley below.

i tried to report this sighting in october, but your site didn't respond correctly.
content.summary: Oval object reflecting street light which was observed by binoculars

content.detailedDescription: Moved in from the south west, all i can say is that it was super sonic in speed, stopped very quickly, hovered with different lights pulsating then a imense displaym of gold and white light came on and it just moved a few meters and vanished into thin air??
content.summary: Oval disk 30 to 35 ft, sice i have been 5 yrs old, bad dreams and repeated sightings, tired of it

content.detailedDescription:
ok so on this particular night my fiance had called me onto our balcony to look at a light that was to the east. it looked like it was toward the gorge and maybe ne of mt hood. i stood on my balcony for a half an hour watching the light and it did not move- it did not get closer, it did not get farther- and it did not move in any direction- it just sat there. it looked like a star and just pulsated lights that sometimes changed colors from a purplish to a white and sometimes it even dimmed to a real dim pin dot light before illuminating again in to a pulsating hanging star...
 while watching the light i saw many airplanes come over the horizon and their lights would noticably move as they came closer- they would pass over head and then proceed west to the airport. during this time the light over the east horizon did not move or appear to be getting closer at any time- for almost 2 hours i watched the light and it stayed the same.
 also- i actually took a video of the object- and as i was doing so my fiance was telling me from inside the house to just leave it alone and don't take any pictures- when i rewatched the video immediately after the incident i noticed three lights appear in the video which were not visible with the naked eye during the incident- the three lights appeared in the left side of the camera view and did not appear to come from any source at the time- as the location of these lights was on the side of the building where there are no lighting or way for these lights to appear. they were in ascending order and appeared to get closer to the location of where i was standing with each light.- almost like if i was being tracked or pinpointed.
 the next day when i was going to upload the video i found that the charging port on my phone had been burned out and the phone is inoperable ( though i still have it) 


i have continued to see the light and have seen it on a few additional occasions to the east of troutdale apparently over the gorge- always in the same location- always stationary- always with planes coming and going in the night sky...This is not an airplane...

perplexed...
content.summary: We watched light hover horizon for a long time and watched many planes come and go...Light did not move and i took video.

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling east on hwy 80 at approx. 45mph when i noticed a light approaching my location, traveling west on the south side of the highway approx. 200' in the air. i traveled for approx. 400' before turning right into a church entrance where i came to a stop under a street light. the light continued traveling toward my location. when the light came whiten approx. 150-200yds of my location it banked right (my right its left)circling around me then proceeded to travel east, parallel with the highway.

the vehicle did not make any noise upon, during and after its approach and pass. when the vehicle banked right (my right its left) i noticed three (3) lights on the craft in a triangle formation.

it should also be noted that hwy 80 runs parallel with interstate 20. i also noticed what appeared to be a strobe-light in the sky that night. it had a variable strobe that seemed to flash randomly. i also noticed this strobe-light the following night and haven't seen it since.
content.summary: Black triangle

content.detailedDescription: I was out smoking like i normally do with my dogs, avid astronomer and always looking up. i have seen several things in the skys over ny house many times. i was looking at 2 airplanes going by and i noticed a bright light coming from the south. i would have gone right over my house but it made a course correction behind the trees which i did not see, but when i saw it again it was traveling ne instead of due n. it was bigger than a star or what a satellite would be, and i watched it for 2 minutes before going out of site. i immediately went in and got on the nasa site and looked to see if the iss was going over than or another satellite, neither the iss of any satellite at the time was going over my house, and since when does a satellite change direction? there are a few more stories about what i have seen over loveland ohio and else where in my travels. was very high up in space, but it was bright and big.
content.summary: Bright light bigger than a star or satellite

content.detailedDescription: I was monsoon season i went out the east side of the house to see if there were any storms i seen clouds way off in the distance to the ne. i looked striaght up and seen a bright star and i thought that's not the north star. then it flew to the west with a path like the shape of the top of a candy cane. the fuchsia and the roof were in the way as it flew. so that's all i seen
content.summary: Light in sky stationary then changed derection

content.detailedDescription: This story was told to me by my grandmother she was in the back yard hanging clothes. she heard something hit the trees she looked and she seen what looked like a balloon without a basket with lights around it. see went in the house and came out later and it was gone. years after her death i was watching unsolved mysteries and there was a drawing of a ufo that looked exactly like a balloon without a basket. around the same time   my other family members reported another siting of a completely different craft. i also seen a object in 82 here in phoenix az but not as an event as theirs
content.summary: Story of my grandmother sighting

content.detailedDescription:
In the spring of this year (2011, my friend and i were traveling up main street in athol when we witnessed what we thought was a helocopter hovering above adams farm.  we were in the area of athol historical society, heading up main street.  by the time we reached the old steak house (some 110 yards away), this craft was hovering over my house on grove street, like 100 to 200 feet above the house.  i rolled down my window to get a better look and to listen to it.  it was completely silent.  while above my house, it slowly turned to the left and slowly followed the line of houses up grove street, paused at the turn, turned right onto summer street, continued to follow the house line to main street, where it paused again, turned slight right to point at the quabbin reservoir, then took off at a high rate of speed in that direction.  both my friend and i were in awe.  it did not resemble any aircraft known to me.

the craft was black or dark in color, triangular in shape, and had white lights around it's perimeter.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: A friend and i a craft at a distance then it flew very fast and hovered over my house then took off towards the quabbin reservoir.

content.detailedDescription: The event took place while i was driving, my 17 year old son was with me he saw it too. it was a ball of light that fell at a 45 degree angle and then abruptly turned left at a 90 degree angle and just kinda darted all around before disipearring. we looked at each other and said, "did you see that"? at first when it was desending i thought it was a meteor, then it turned, i knew then it was not a meteor! it happened really fast. it looked like the ball of light that decended over the wailing wall in jerusalem and actually acted in the same manner.
content.summary: Round ball of light
